biotools.summary: Mutational Signatures in Cancer is a shiny-based web application aimed to visualize the somatic mutational profile of a series of provided samples (different formats are allowed) and to extract the contribution of the reported mutational signatures on their variation profile. It is mainly based on the MutationalPatterns R package.

bioschemas.name: MuSiCa
bioschemas.summary: Mutational Signatures in Cancer is a shiny-based web application aimed to visualize the somatic mutational profile of a series of provided samples (different formats are allowed) and to extract the contribution of the reported mutational signatures on their variation profile. It is mainly based on the MutationalPatterns R package.
